    • processFlatBooking

      public Receipt processFlatBooking(BTOApplication app)
      Process flat booking for an approved application. Since the manager already decreased the unit count during application approval, this just needs to mark the flat as booked.
      Parameters:
      app - The application to book a flat for
      Returns:
      A receipt for the booking, or null if booking failed
